title: The Rise of Jin Young: Consultant Hero

story.text: Jin Young, a seasoned teacher and consultant, stumbled upon a mysterious artifact in his attic, which granted him the power to amplify the potential of anyone he coached, making them excel at unprecedented rates.
Excited by his new abilities, Jin dedicates his day to helping struggling local businesses, turning their failures into successes overnight.
Word of his talents spreads, and Jin is called to a struggling school. He uses his powers to boost the teachers' abilities, dramatically improving the studentsâ€™ test scores.
Trouble brews as a jealous rival learns of Jin's powers and plots to steal the artifact. Jin is unaware, busy consulting for an underdog sports team.
The rival confronts Jin, attempting to steal the artifact during a major sports event. A dramatic showdown ensues at the stadium.
With the help of the community he's supported, Jin manages to thwart his rival. They rally behind him, embracing his role as a true 'Consultant Hero'.
Reflecting on his week, Jin decides to establish a foundation to train young consultants and educators, spreading his heroic deeds worldwide.

ending: Jin Young realized that true power lies in empowering others.
moral: The greatest gift one can give is the ability to enable others to reach their full potential.
